/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting beautifully with the green of the trees and the various hues of the buildings.
